subject: Science
title: The James Webb Space Telescope
description: Learn The James Webb Space Telescope in one minute.

hook.text: The James Webb Space Telescope launched in 2021 after 25 years of development.

buildup.text: Its 6.5-meter gold mirror sees infrared light from the earliest galaxies.

discovery.text: Webb orbits 1.5 million km from Earth at a gravitationally stable point.

twist.text: 344 single points of failure had to work perfectly during deployment. All did.

climax.text: Its first images revealed galaxies formed just 300 million years after the Big Bang.
